page.title: 08A SHOPPERS PARADISE ?
page.content: There are no proper shopping facilities. The sub Post Office offers Giro banking in addition to normal Post Office trade. Sweets and cigarettes are also on sale at the Post office and at a small confectionary shop. All shopping is done outside the area, free buses to local markets and hypermarkets are provided. Milk and bread are delivered daily, National Daily newspapers and magazines also. There are two local newspapers delivered weekly, The Lydney Observer and The Forest Review which is a free newspaper. Fresh fish is also delivered weekly. Mail order catalogues are available.
